feed.title: 黑客新闻摘要; ;https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml; ;2023-06-14T08:05:45.139202Z; ; ; ; ;polyrabbit; ;https://github.com/polyrabbit/; ; ;Werkzeug; ; ;5-羟色胺增强剂可增强功能性大脑连接</stitle>; <id>;https://www.alphagalileo.org/en-gb/Item-Display/ItemId/234406?returnurl= https://www.alphagalileo.org/en-gb/Item-Display/ItemId/234406</id>; <更新>;2023-06-14T06:05:16.427786Z</更新>; <link href="https:/ /www.alphagalileo.org/en-gb/Item-Display/ItemId/234406?returnurl=https://www.alphagalileo.org/en-gb/Item-Display/ItemId/234406"/>; <作者>; <姓名>;giuliomagnifico</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=giuliomagnifico</uri>; </author>; <内容类型="html">;<img src="https://galileoalphamessages .s3.eu-west-2.amazonaws.com/Uploads/imported/79746_Elsevier3.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 249px;" />;<br />;《生物精神病学：认知神经科学和神经影像学》的一项新研究表明，5-羟色胺增强剂普卢卡必利可用于治疗伴随情绪障碍和其他精神疾病的认知缺陷。该研究发现普卡必利增加功能健康成年人的大脑连接，尤其是主要认知网络之间的连接。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#serotonin-booster-leads-to-increased-functional-brain-connectivity" target="_blank" >;[总结]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36321843" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Cormac McCarthy 去世了</stitle>; <id>;https://www.nytimes.com /2023/06/13/books/cormac-mccarthy-dead.html</id>; <更新>;2023-06-13T20:05:16.428588Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.nytimes. com/2023/06/13/books/cormac-mccarthy-dead.html"/>; <author>; <name>;benbreen</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=benbreen< /uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://static01.nyt.com/images/2023/06/14/obituaries/00mccarthy_cormac-1-print1/00mccarthy_cormac-1- articleLarge.jpg?quality=75&auto=webp&disable=upscale" style="width: 220px; height: 275px;" />;<br />;隐居作家科马克·麦卡锡 (Cormac McCarthy) 去世，享年 89 岁，享年 89 岁。条件，赢得了无数奖项并被改编成电影，但也因其自我意识的男性气质和缺乏著名的女性角色而招致批评。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#cormac-mccarthy-has-死亡" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36316079" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;< /content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;麦当劳刚刚发布了一款全新的 Game Boy 游戏</stitle>; <id>;https://retrododo.com/mcdonalds-grimaces-birthday/</id>; <updated>;2023-06-13T20:05:16.429149Z</updated>; <link href="https://retrododo.com /mcdonalds-grimaces-birthday/"/>; <author>; <name>;outime</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=outime</uri>; </author>; <内容类型="html">;<img src="https://retrododo.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/06/grimaces-birthday-gameboy-game-800x450.webp" style="width: 220px; height: 124px;" />;<br />;麦当劳发布了一款名为 Grimace's Birthday 的新 Game Boy Color 游戏，由 Gumpy Function 使用 GB Studio 开发。该游戏涉及扮演 Grimace 在滑板上，试图在他的生日那天找到他的朋友派对。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#mcdonald-s-just-dropped-a-brand-new-game-boy-game" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a >; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36316134" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base=" https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;迈向更有用的键盘</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/jasonrudolph/keyboard</id>; <updated>;2023-06-14T06:05:16.429742Z</updated>; <link href="https://github.com/jasonrudolph/keyboard"/>; <author>; <name>;quyleanh</name>; <uri>; https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=quyleanh</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/2988/ 22397420/f2b3e346-e53e-11e6-97bb-9db71f86994b.png" style="width: 220px; height: 112px;" />;<br />;这篇文章讨论了作者通过根据个人喜好自定义键盘来创建更有用的键盘的探索。他们解释了他们如何重新利用大写锁定键并使用键盘快捷键来优化各种工作流程应用程序。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#toward-a-more-useful-keyboard" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https:// news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36321763" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/ feed.xml">; <title type="text">;自 2026 年 6 月 7 日起，Autodesk 将不再销售或支持 EAGLE</stitle>; <id>;https://www.autodesk.com/support/technical/article/ caas/sfdcarticles/sfdcarticles/Autodesk-EAGLE-Announcement-Next-steps-and-FAQ.html</id>; <更新>;2023-06-14T00:05:16.430535Z</更新>; <link href="https:/ /www.autodesk.com/support/technical/article/caas/sfdcarticles/sfdcarticles/Autodesk-EAGLE-Announcement-Next-steps-and-FAQ.html"/>; <author>; <name>;ambientenv</name>; <uri >;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=ambientenv</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;自 2026 年 6 月 7 日起，Autodesk 将停止销售和支持 EAGLE。Fusion 360 固定期限的使用许可将在 2026 年 6 月不再支持之前，仍然提供对 EAGLE Premium 的访问。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#effective-june-7-2026-autodesk-will-no-longer-sell- nor-support-eagle" target="_blank">;[总结]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36319137" target="_blank">;[评论]< /a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;新 RAM 卡，原型 Mac Portable，演示系统 7</stitle>; <id>;http://oldvcr.blogspot.com/2023/06/new-ram-card-prototype-mac-portable.html</id>; <更新>;2023-06-14T05:05 :16.431129Z</updated>; <link href="http://oldvcr.blogspot.com/2023/06/new-ram-card-prototype-mac-portable.html"/>; <author>; <name>;classichasclass< /name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=classichasclass</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://blogger.googleusercontent. com/img/b/R29vZ2xl/AVvXsEjtxcZARpXDbgZsTqOe0KnzV6snMn2icIuHHzRKIqJqVm3LV6YpfCkFPfal3rOLw6L9SHhpXaYxjNNE5-dFEn_VPD332oGWJ1I5EJk6sbfroxCX0KWsPr8P gyk00CBaNWVfznenAZZjp3QfYHEfjRTLUZRS-aHjVAWflqCdvV6MXOSxQlzFKqtOhiyE/s320/PXL_20230613_173747304.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 166px;" />;<br />;文章是对Androda新推出的7MB Macintosh Portable RAM卡的Tech评测。作者建议购买该卡，因为Macintosh Portable的RAM卡很难找到，而且比较旧MacEffects 8MB 升级不再进行。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#new-ram-card-prototype-mac-portable-demo-system-7" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36321310" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;JupyterLab 4.0</stitle>; <id>;https://blog.jupyter.org/jupyterlab-4 -0-is-here-388d05e03442?gi=692635ec8178</id>; <更新>;2023-06-13T20:05:16.431811Z</更新>; <link href="https://blog.jupyter.org/jupyterlab- 4-0-is-here-388d05e03442?gi=692635ec8178"/>; <author>; <name>;jonbaer</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=jonbaer</uri>; < /author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://miro.medium.com/v2/resize:fit:1200/1*Y3aNGoRED2q0pWjlHmr9wg.png" style="width: 220px; height: 119px;" />;<br />;JupyterLab 4.0 是 Jupyter 开发环境的最新版本，现已在 PyPI 和 conda-forge 上可用。它包括更快的渲染、升级的文本编辑器、新的扩展管理器、改进的文档搜索、UI 和辅助功能改进以及错误修复。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#jupyterlab-4-0" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href= “https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36315796” target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews .betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;完成你的项目</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/readme/guides/finish-your-projects</id>; <更新>;2023-06-13T19:05:16.432407Z</更新>; <link href="https://github.com/readme/guides/finish-your-projects"/>; <author>; <name>;aarondf</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=aarondf</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://images.ctfassets.net /s5uo95nf6njh/7AlDzZ2iGukvOe26kfIgLJ/fe6c6ab58b880503c20f27a3e364b83f/Open_source_staircase__1___1_.jpg?w=1200&fm=jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 257px;" />;<br />;自述项目旨在通过承认过程中的困难来鼓励人们完成他们的开源项目。这篇文章讨论了从开始项目的最初兴奋到转变的挑战完成它的不那么迷人的工作，并提供了克服这些障碍的策略。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#finish-your-projects" target="_blank">;[summary]</a >; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36313671" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base=" https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;ZX81 机械键盘</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/swetland/zx81-keyboard</id>; <更新>;2023-06-13T21:05:16.433006Z</更新>; <link href="https://github.com/swetland/zx81-keyboard"/>; <作者>; <name>;zoenolan</name>; < uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=zoenolan</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/swetland/ zx81-keyboard/main/images/keyboard-with-custom-keycaps.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 120px;" />;<br />;这篇文章是关于与 Sinclair ZX81 及其现代娱乐产品 ZX81+38 兼容的机械键盘。存储库包含键盘的设计文件、导出版本和图像。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#zx81-mechanical-keyboard" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/ item?id=36316311" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; < title type="text">;Launch HN: Resend (YC W23) – 面向使用 React 的开发人员的电子邮件 API</stitle>; <id>;https://resend.com</id>; <updated>;2023-06-13T13:05 :16.433701Z</updated>; <link href="https://resend.com"/>; <author>; <name>;zenorocha</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=泽诺罗查</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://resend.com/_next/image?url=%2Fstatic%2Flanding-page%2Fbghero.png&w=2048&q=75 " style="宽度: 220px; height: 220px;" />;<br />;Resend 是一个面向开发人员的电子邮件 API，它提供可靠且易于使用的电子邮件发送解决方案。它提供诸如多区域支持和专用 IP 等功能以提高送达率。< href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#launch-hn-resend-yc-w23-email-api-for-developers-using-react" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36309120" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https ://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;面向方面的编程</stitle>; <id>;https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Aspect-oriented_programming</ id>; <updated>;2023-06-14T05:05:16.434330Z</updated>; <link href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Aspect-oriented_programming"/>; <author>; <name>;alraj< /name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=alraj</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;面向方面的编程（AOP）是一种编程范式，旨在通过将横切关注点与主代码分离来增加模块化。它允许将行为添加到现有代码中而无需直接修改它。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#aspect-oriented-programming" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/ item?id=36308806" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; < title type="text">;游戏化、生活和对金徽章的追求</stitle>; <id>;https://austinhenley.com/blog/gamification.html</id>; <updated>;2023-06-14T04 :05:16.435060Z</updated>; <link href="https://austinhenley.com/blog/gamification.html"/>; <author>; <name>;azhenley</name>; <uri>;https://news. ycombinator.com/user?id=azhenley</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://austinhenley.com/blog/images/trophies.png" style="宽度: 220px; 高度: 101px;" />;<br />;游戏化和指标跟踪对作者的生活有很大的影响，控制着他们的职业、休闲时间、社会关系和财务。尽管知道公司使用的心理策略，作者仍然喜欢游戏化和指标，质疑它们的有效性。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#gamification-life-and-the-pursuit-of-a-gold-badge" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href ="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36320746" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https:// hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;使用 Rust 制作 RISC-V 操作系统</stitle>; <id>;https://osblog.stephenmarz.com/</id>; <更新>;2023-06-14T04:05:16.435701Z</更新>; <link href="https://osblog.stephenmarz.com/"/>; <author>; <name>;azhenley</name>; <uri>;https: //news.ycombinator.com/user?id=azhenley</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://osblog.stephenmarz.com/feed.png" style= “宽度：220px；高度：221px；” />;<br />;本文讨论了使用 Rust 编程语言创建面向 RISC-V 架构的操作系统的过程。它强调了为 RISC-V 提供合适的开发环境的重要性，并提到本教程将从头开始逐步构建操作系统。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#making-a-risc-v-operating-system-using-rust" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href=" https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36320914" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews. betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Runbook 之夜：DevOps 恐怖故事</stitle>; <id>;https://bitfieldconsulting.com/blog/night-of-the-runbooks </id>; <更新>;2023-06-14T04:05:16.436309Z</更新>; <link href="https://bitfieldconsulting.com/blog/night-of-the-runbooks"/>; <作者>; <名称>;gus_leonel</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=gus_leonel</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https:// images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/5e10bdc20efb8f0d169f85f9/1634232659574-0XLU246AK5I9T87DNGZT/Beep-Beep-Richie.jpg?content-type=image%2Fjpeg" style="宽度：220px；高度：225px；" />;<br />;这篇文章讲述了摩根第一个晚上值班的故事，他们收到了关于他们不熟悉的服务发生严重事件的警报。但是，他们找到了指导他们完成故障排除步骤的运行手册，使他们能够成功解决问题。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#night-of-the-runbooks-a-devops-horror-story" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href=" https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36307883" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews. betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Reddit 停电将继续</stitle>; <id>;https://old.reddit.com/r/ModCoord/comments/148ks6u/indefinite_blackout_next_steps_polling_your/< /id>; <更新>;2023-06-14T06:05:16.436799Z</更新>; <link href="https://old.reddit.com/r/ModCoord/comments/148ks6u/indefinite_blackout_next_steps_polling_your/"/>; <author >; <name>;taubek</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=taubek</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https: //external-preview.redd.it/jm6VqUyxKmYMYazA5b04VxOgBoWdp7IUTZjeN1MXLAc.jpg?width=1200&height=628&auto=webp&crop=1200:628,smart&v=enabled&s=8ff28751bc0d4ef7360126dafdb95b3 f0b958d26" style="宽度：220px；高度：116px；" />;<br />;Reddit 宣布了一项政策变更，将淘汰第三方 Reddit 应用程序，只留下官方应用程序作为一个选项。这导致数以千计的 subreddit 停电以示抗议，要求 Reddit 提供令人满意的解决方案。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-reddit-blackout-will-continue" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news. ycombinator.com/item?id=36321780" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed. xml">; <title type="text">;并行编程难吗？如果难，你能做些什么？ v2023.06.11a</stitle>; <id>;https://mirrors.edge.kernel.org/pub/linux/kernel/people/paulmck/perfbook/perfbook.html</id>; <更新>;2023-06-14T06 :05:16.437296Z</updated>; <link href="https://mirrors.edge.kernel.org/pub/linux/kernel/people/paulmck/perfbook/perfbook.html"/>; <作者>; <名称>; nequo</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=nequo</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;这篇文章讨论了一本书可以使用的不同格式出版，例如平装书的双栏格式，大型电子书阅读器的单栏格式，以及智能手机和小型电子书阅读器的电子书格式。它还提供了获取书籍实体副本的选项，并提到了不同封面艺术品的可用性。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#is-parallel-programming-hard-and-if-so-what-c​​an-you-do-about-it-v2023-06-11a" target= "_blank">;[summary]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;该我看到的微架构和我希望有一天看到的微架构 [pdf]</stitle>; <id>;https://hardwear.io/usa-2023/presentation/the-microarchitectures-that-I-saw-and- the-ones-that-I-hope-to-one-day-see.pdf</id>; <更新>;2023-06-14T02:05:16.437825Z</更新>; <link href="https://hardwear .io/usa-2023/presentation/the-microarchitectures-that-I-saw-and-the-ones-that-I-hope-to-one-day-see.pdf"/>; <author>; <name>;luu </name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=luu</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;文章讨论了作者对 CPU bug 的经验和观点，以及平台安全性，强调研究人员需要在设计阶段了解漏洞的可能性。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-microarchitectures-that-i-saw-and-the-ones-that-i-hope-to-one-day-see-pdf" target= "_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36320316" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; < /entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Track HN：Show HN Stories 的存活率</stitle>; <id>;https ://nami.land/2023/06/11/track-hn-analyze-survival-rate-of-120-396-show-hn-posts-june-2023.html</id>; <更新>;2023-06 -13T18:05:16.438349Z</updated>; <link href="https://nami.land/2023/06/11/track-hn-analyze-survival-rate-of-120-396-show-hn- posts-june-2023.html"/>; <author>; <name>;namiwang</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=namiwang</uri>; </author>; <内容类型="html">;<img src="https://nami.land/assets/thn/2306/Show%20HN%20submitted%20by%20year.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：140px；" />;<br />;剧透警告：许多好的项目都没有幸存下来 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#track-hn-survival-rate-of-show-hn-stories" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36313562" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content >; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;刘易斯·海因 20 世纪早期的“照片故事”</stitle>; < id>;https://www.smithsonianmag.com/history/the-photographer-who-forced-the-us-to-confront-its-child-labor-problem-180982355/</id>; <更新>;2023-06 -13T22:05:16.438849Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.smithsonianmag.com/history/the-photographer-who-forced-the-us-to-confront-its-child-labor- problem-180982355/"/>; <author>; <name>;cratermoon</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=cratermoon</uri>; </author>; <content type="html ">;<img src="https://th-thumbnailer.cdn-si-edu.com/rL39Jd_skZBVfNEcn2Y62OX_ksE=/fit-in/1072x0/filters:focal(1429x844:1430x845)/https://tf-cmsv2-smithsonianmag -media.s3.amazonaws.com/filer_public/f1/0d/f10dc681-3be7-45bc-9d8e-b7a895d3bb17/screenshot_2023-06-12_at_95133_am.png" style="width: 220px; height: 130px;" />;<br />;刘易斯·威克斯·海因 (Lewis Wickes Hine) 在 20 世纪初拍摄的童工照片帮助倡导了童工法和保护措施，但这个问题今天仍然存在，因为有关违规行为的报道和州立法的回滚合法工作年龄。虽然 Hine 的照片侧重于白人儿童，但当代关于童工违规行为的报道却很少提供图片来配合他们的文字、图表和统计数据。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#lewis-hines -early-20th-century-photo-stories" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36317587" target="_blank" >;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;一个简单的哈希表在 C 中</stitle>; <id>;https://theleo.zone/posts/hashmap-in-c/</id>; <updated>;2023-06-13T20:05:16.439334Z</updated>; <link href= "https://theleo.zone/posts/hashmap-in-c/"/>; <author>; <name>;todsacerdoti</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=todsacerdoti< /uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;文章解释了如何用C实现一个简单的哈希表，包括哈希函数、指针和内存段的使用。它还讨论了哈希表背后的设计决策及其性能特征。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#a-simple-hash-table-in-c" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https:// news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36302552" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/ feed.xml">; <title type="text">;高利率能解决高通胀吗？</stitle>; <id>;https://www.lynalden.com/inflation-vs-interest-rates/</id>; <updated>;2023-06-13T20:05:16.439820Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.lynalden.com/inflation-vs-interest-rates/"/>; <author>; <name>;fuoqi </name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=fuoqi</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.lynalden .com/wp-content/uploads/inflation-interest-rates-feature.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：95px；" />;<br />;这篇文章探讨了通货膨胀的原因以及中央银行如何通过其政策，特别是通过利率来影响通货膨胀。它还强调了货币创造的不同来源，例如财政赤字和银行贷款，以及它们如何以不同方式促进通货膨胀。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#do-high-interest-rates-fix-high-inflation" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https: //news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36315608" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat. io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;开源医院价格数据库</stitle>; <id>;https://www.dolthub.com/repositories/dolthub/transparency-in-pricing/data/main /rate</id>; <更新>;2023-06-13T21:05:16.440631Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.dolthub.com/repositories/dolthub/transparency-in-pricing/data/ main/rate"/>; <author>; <name>;alecst</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=alecst</uri>; </author>; <content type="html" >; <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#open-source-hospital-price-database" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news .ycombinator.com/item?id=36316883" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed .xml">; <title type="text">;Elixir 的“集合理论类型系统”原型/演示/展示</stitle>; <id>;https://typex.fly.dev</id>; <updated>;2023-06 -13T23:05:16.441214Z</updated>; <link href="https://typex.fly.dev"/>; <author>; <name>;weatherlight</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator. com/user?id=weatherlight</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;本文讨论了 Elixir 的集合理论类型系统的原型类型检查器，旨在对一些示例进行类型检查，目前还没有反映Elixir 类型的最终形式。原型依赖于第三方语言，并且具有类型注释的语法，如 function_name :: (type) over function definitions。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#elixir-s-set-theoretical-type-system-prototype-demo-showcase" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href ="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36299214" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https:// hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;递归的诅咒：对生成数据的训练让模型忘记</stitle>; <id>;https://arxiv.org/abs/2305.17493< /id>; <updated>;2023-06-14T00:05:16.441700Z</updated>; <link href="https://arxiv.org/abs/2305.17493"/>; <author>; <name>;indus</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=indus</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://static.arxiv.org/static /browse/0.3.4/images/arxiv-logo-fb.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：129px；" />;<br />;GPT-2、GPT-3(.5) 和 GPT-4 等大型语言模型 (LLM) 在语言任务中表现出令人印象深刻的性能，但在训练中使用模型生成的内容可能会导致不可逆转的缺陷生成的模型，称为模型崩溃，原始内容分布的尾部消失。这种现象在所有已学习的生成模型中普遍存在，必须认真对待以维持从网络上抓取的大规模数据进行训练的好处。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-curse-of-recursion-training-on-generated-data-makes-models-forget" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a >; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36319076" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base=" https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;显示 HN：在浏览器中运行的 LLaMA 分词器</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/belladoreai/llama -tokenizer-js</id>; <updated>;2023-06-13T21:05:16.442219Z</updated>; <link href="https://github.com/belladoreai/llama-tokenizer-js"/>; <作者>; <name>;belladoreai</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=belladoreai</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https: //opengraph.githubassets.com/90e5c164681525f87078c2b0e50d6970b68f55500d8937ff023380746aabde8f/belladoreai/llama-tokenizer-js" style="宽度：220px；高度：110px；" />;<br />;本文介绍了 LLaMA 的第一个 JavaScript 分词器，它在浏览器和 Node 中运行，具有优化的运行时间和包大小。它还将其与 Web 应用程序中使用的其他流行分词器进行了比较，并解释了 LLaMA 模型的兼容性。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#show-hn-llama-tokenizer-that-runs-in-browser" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href=" https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36316489" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews. betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;私募股权正在收购从兽医办公室到科技集团的一切</stitle>; <id>;https://www.theverge.com/23758492/private-equity -brendan-ballou-plunder-finance-doj</id>; <更新>;2023-06-13T18:05:16.442710Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.theverge.com/23758492/private- equity-brendan-ballou-plunder-finance-doj"/>; <author>; <name>;Brajeshwar</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=Brajeshwar</uri>; </author >; <content type="html">;<img src="https://duet-cdn.vox-cdn.com/thumbor/0x0:2040x1360/2400x2400/filters:focal(1020x680:1021x681):格式(webp)/ cdn.vox-cdn.com/uploads/chorus_asset/file/24722142/236699_Decoder_Brendan_Ballou_WJoel.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：220px；" />;<br />;私募股权公司收集现金，筹集投资者现金，并承担债务以收购公司，通常将它们从公开股票市场撤出。然后他们任命新的管理层并着手积极削减成本和扭亏为盈计划，目标是出售公司或再次上市以获取利润。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#private-equity-is-buying-everything-from-vet-offices-to-tech-conglomerates" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a >; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36313967" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base=" https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;OnBoard——一项新的资助计划，为青少年的 PCB 成本提供 100 美元的资金</stitle>; <id>;https://hackclub。 com/onboard/</id>; <updated>;2023-06-13T23:05:16.443197Z</updated>; <link href="https://hackclub.com/onboard/"/>; <author>; <name>;zachlatta </name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=zachlatta</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://cloud-6exi6bz1i -hack-club-bot.vercel.app/0rotatesprig.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：177px；" />;<br />;在 GitHub 上开源您的设计并申请资助！您必须是高中生才能申请。结识其他学习如何制作自己的电路板的人。在迈出这一步时，与他人合作、寻求帮助并支持他人。喜欢贴纸？在下方申请，我们将免费向您寄送一个装满贴纸的信封。申请贴纸 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#onboard-a-new-grants-program-to-fund-青少年 100 英寸 pcb 成本" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36318805" target="_blank ">;[comments]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;金属着色器转换器以及缺少的设备范围屏障</stitle>; <id>;https://raphlinus.github.io/gpu/2023/06/12/shader-converter.html</id>; <updated>;2023-06-13T20： 05:16.443682Z</updated>; <link href="https://raphlinus.github.io/gpu/2023/06/12/shader-converter.html"/>; <作者>; <name>;raphlinus</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=raphlinus</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;Apple 推出了 Metal shader converter 工具，用于将着色器从 DXIL 转换为 Metal，但是Metal 中缺乏对原子屏障的支持阻碍了 WebGPU 的性能，并增加了 GPU 生态系统的复杂性。作者建议关注 GPU 计算的坚实、符合规范的基础，并为 Asahi Linux 在 Apple Silicon 上实施 Vulkan 的工作欢呼。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#metal-shader-converter-and-the-missing-device-scoped-barrier" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href ="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36298798" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https:// hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;快速工作比看起来更重要 (2015)</stitle>; <id>;http://jsomers.net/blog/speed-matters </id>; <updated>;2023-06-13T17:05:16.444569Z</updated>; <link href="http://jsomers.net/blog/speed-matters"/>; <author>; <name>;cal85< /名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=cal85</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="http://jsomers.net/博客/wp-content/uploads/2015/07/Screen-Shot-2015-07-26-at-6.03.14-PM.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：316px；" />;<br />;本文提供有关如何排查和修复网站上的 500 错误的信息，这是 Web 服务器在满足客户端发出的请求时遇到问题时返回的一般错误类。它涵盖了错误的常见原因，例如文件所有权问题、权限模式、.htaccess 文件中的冲突行和进程限制，并提供了有关如何在 cPanel 中编辑 .htaccess 文件和文件权限的说明。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#working-quickly-is-more-important-than-it-seems-2015" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href ="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36312295" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https:// hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Aleister Crowley and William Butler Yeats get into an occult battle</stitle>; <id>;https://www.openculture.com/2016/10 /aleister-crowley-william-butler-yeats-get-into-an-occult-battle.html</id>; <updated>;2023-06-14T02:05:16.445083Z</updated>; <link href="https: //www.openculture.com/2016/10/aleister-crowley-william-butler-yeats-get-into-an-occult-battle.html"/>; <author>; <name>;GloomyBoots</name>; <uri>; https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=GloomyBoots</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://cdn8.openculture.com/wp-content/ uploads/2016/10/09223558/Crowley-Yeats-e1476080295373.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 165px;" />;<br />;Aleister Crowley and William Butler Yeats were bitter rivals in the world of magic, with Yeats joining the Hermetic Order of the Golden Dawn and Crowley founding the religion of Thelema. Their conflict was both poetic and practical, with Crowley being kicked out of the Golden Dawn for his dark magic and attempting to use his powers against Yeats and his fellow white magicians. <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#aleister-crowley-and-william-butler-yeats-get-into-an-occult-battle" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36319691" target="_blank">;[comments]</a>;</content>; </entry>; </feed>;
